title: Community Haiku: Champions
body:
Inspired by an in-game request from **Wilemon**, the support in a ranked game I played, I crafted a haiku around the champion Nami. Then another player, **All Hells Fire**, suggested making it a community thing, which is the second best idea I've heard all day. So here it is, a thread for community haiku. The only rules are: it should be a haiku, and it needs to be about a champion, not refrigerators. 

Here's my submission for {{champion:267}} , so by my count we need 118 more (unless we take too long, in which case we'll need one additional poem):

"Frozen in jade glaze,
fighting against the riptide--
ambitious fishes."
